patthana15.62:1.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati
patthana15.62:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo
patthana15.62:1.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalañca naupekkhāsahagataṁ kusalañca
patthana15.62:1.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.62:2.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati
patthana15.62:2.1_1: hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo
patthana15.62:2.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Upekkhāsahagataṁ akusalañca naupekkhāsahagataṁ akusalañca
patthana15.62:2.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā
